results.name: a(n) = A003973(n) / A336846(n).
comment: If there are no more 1's in this sequence after the initial one, then there are no odd terms of A001599 (Ore's Harmonic Numbers) larger than one.

program: A003961(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); factorback(f); };
